com.github.spranshu1.aws.utils.s3

Class S3Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.spranshu1.aws.utils.s3.S3Service

  • public class S3Service
extends Object
    S3 service that provides s3 client used for managing buckets at that 'endPoint'
